  17. (**************************** Input control ****************************)

  19. open Unix
  20. open Primitives

  22. (*** Actives files. ***)

  24. (* List of the actives files. *)
  25. ‌let active_files =
  26.   ref ([] : (file_descr * ((io_channel -> unit) * io_channel)) list)

  28. (* Add a file to the list of actives files. *)
  29. ‌let add_file file controller =
  30.   active_files := (file.io_fd, (controller, file))::!active_files

  32. (* Remove a file from the list of actives files. *)
  33. ‌let remove_file file =
  34.   active_files := List.remove_assoc file.io_fd !active_files

  36. (* Change the controller for the given file. *)
  37. ‌let change_controller file controller =
  38.   remove_file file; add_file file controller

  40. (* Return the controller currently attached to the given file. *)
  41. ‌let current_controller file =
  42.   fst (List.assoc file.io_fd !active_files)

  44. (* Execute a function with `controller' attached to `file'. *)
  45. (* ### controller file funct *)
  46. ‌let execute_with_other_controller controller file funct =
  47.   let old_controller = current_controller file in
  48.     change_controller file controller;
  49.     let finally () = change_controller file old_controller in
  50.     Fun.protect ~finally funct

  52. (*** The "Main Loop" ***)

  54. ‌let continue_main_loop =
  55.   ref true

  57. ‌let exit_main_loop _ =
  58.   continue_main_loop := false

  60. (* Handle active files until `continue_main_loop' is false. *)
  61. ‌let main_loop () =
  62.   let finally =
  63.     let old_state = !continue_main_loop in
  64.     fun () -> continue_main_loop := old_state
  65.   in
  66.     Fun.protect ~finally @@ fun () ->
  67.       continue_main_loop := true;
  68.       while !continue_main_loop do
  69.         try
  70.           let (input, _, _) =
  71.             select (List.map fst !active_files) [] [] (-1.)
  72.           in
  73.             List.iter
  74.               (function fd ->
  75.                  let (funct, iochan) = (List.assoc fd !active_files) in
  76.                    funct iochan)
  77.               input
  78.         with
  79.           Unix_error (EINTR, _, _) -> ()
  80.       done

  82. (*** Managing user inputs ***)

  84. (* Are we in interactive mode ? *)
  85. ‌let interactif = ref true

  87. ‌let current_prompt = ref ""

  89. (* Where the user input come from. *)
  90. ‌let user_channel = ref std_io

  92. ‌let read_user_input buffer length =
  93.   main_loop ();
  94.   input !user_channel.io_in buffer 0 length

  96. (* Stop reading user input. *)
  97. ‌let stop_user_input () =
  98.   remove_file !user_channel

  100. (* Resume reading user input. *)
  101. ‌let resume_user_input () =
  102.   if not (List.mem_assoc !user_channel.io_fd !active_files) then begin
  103.     if !interactif && !Parameters.prompt then begin
  104.       print_string !current_prompt;
  105.       flush Stdlib.stdout
  106.       end;
  107.     add_file !user_channel exit_main_loop
  108.     end
